title: Zoe being able to sell her summoner spells for gold?!
body: So you know what would be a great idea, zoe is able to sell her summoners she picks up based on what sum it is and how long till it disappears. Does that sound like a good idea riot? {{champion:142}}

Making her able to sell her free stuff is not the way to get her back in the meta.

Zoe's W is completely random, you could've put it in everyone's kit and it would be fun, but wouldn't make sense. To make it so she can sell them would be even worse to play against. You flash away, she flashes after you. She doesn't? Then she's ahead in lane 'cause she has more gold.
